rules_text:
Flying
Moxie [i](You may have this enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter. If you don't, get {E}{E}.)[/i]
Gemwing Phoenix attacks each combat if able.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {E}{E}{E}{E}. If you do, return Gemwing Phoenix from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste until end of turn.
